name: Holiday Pandamonium
description:
Use Kay and Dee to try and steal presents from Parker the groundskeeper! The game is aimed to be a two player game so it is best played with a friend however it is possible to play the game by yourself although it will be a lot more challenging! Instructions for how to play the game can be found by clicking on the question mark button either on the main menu, or in the pause menu after pausing.

Programmed by: https://d4ngus1.itch.io/

Art by: https://krizzy-arts.itch.io/
